author: jstrachan
msg: Added a simple Swing library for Jelly which means that Swing UIs can be scripted very easily via Jelly script.
To get a taste for how this library works, try running the 'demo:swing' target in the Maven build by typing
and you should see a full Swing UI appear.
It could be that this library could help form the basis of implementing XUL on the Swing platform?

author: jstrachan
msg: patched the new distribution directory link

author: jstrachan
msg: patched the distribution goal to work with new projectId property

author: jstrachan
msg: patched the SQL demos so that the demo:sql target now properly demonstrates the SQL tags in action, without the user needing to know anything or mess around with properties, or have a HSQLDB server running or anything.
the demo:sql target now creates an in-memory HSQLDB database, creates a table, inserts some data, then demonstrates generating some XML from the result set.

author: jstrachan
msg: temporary patch so that System properties are available by default in the global variable scope.
So you can do ${user.home} inside a Jelly script. We'll include a better patch shortly using pluggable Scope objects that make it easier to configure this behaviour
